meeting_overview: Importance of device and distribution formats
Streamlining partnerships with digital item sharing
Feedback collection for future meeting schedule
main_topics: Best device and distribution formats for content sharing
Partnership processes and streamlining digital item distribution

key_points_decisions.decision: Adjust future meetings to accommodate schedule feedback
Allow open nominations for industry speakers
key_points_decisions.impact: Diverse perspectives in future meetings, fostering innovation

key_points_decisions.decision: Continue using NAK3D's proprietary format with consideration of interoperability
key_points_decisions.impact: Maintain current workflow while exploring broader standards

key_points_decisions.decision: Propose a schedule for the next meeting on January 20th, led by Nelly Tacheva
key_points_decisions.impact: Establishes clear expectations and preparation time for participants

action_items.item: Collect and analyze feedback on meeting schedule
action_items.description: Gather participant input to determine optimal timing for future meetings

action_items.item: Nominate industry speakers and review submissions
action_items.description: Encourage nominations from the community, ensuring a broad range of expertise at meetings

action_items.item: Review NAK3D's format strategy in light of interoperability goals
action_items.assigned_to: MSF DFW team and industry experts
action_items.description: Evaluate the use of proprietary formats against open standards for future decision-making

action_items.item: Finalize agenda and schedule for January 20th meeting
action_items.description: Prepare the meeting's structure, topics to be covered, and logistics
